title: Hands in Harmony
creator_credit: Douglas Tunstell, Sydney Newman and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: One of a series of films featuring Canadian musical talent. Saskatchewan’s Neil Chotem, composer, conductor and concert pianist, plays Chopin’s Black Key Study and Study in E Major.
